profile:
Make your home truly yours. A custom kitchen, bathroom or fireplace can add beauty and personality while adding value to your home. Your personal, custom space is closer and more affordable than you think. From new installations to complete renovations let Kasa Bella measure, design and quote your project free of charge.

Our services include:
*Tile & Stone
*Design and Installation from backsplashes to entire bathrooms and kitchens.
*Remove and disposal of old flooring.
*Subfloors; scratch coat, drypack, Ditra.
* Design and Installation; floors, walls, backsplashes, feature walls, fireplaces, balconies & porches.

profile:
Family operated  with the passion of creating something on Our  own, We  developed Focus On Flooring and General Contracting. With many years of experience and a keen eye for details, we carefully picked our  team of Contractors .

Helping local homeowners achieve their goals is one of Our motivations for growing business. Along with experiencing Our client’s appreciation and happiness at the completion of each project.

Remodeling houses and creating  at home ambiance for Our  clients has always been a long-term goal of Focus on Flooring . With Our  growing team of professionals,  We were not only been able to accomplish that but surpassed Our expectations.

With over 15 years of experience in the industry and running a successful business; this gives our clients peace of mind, and You can be sure that You’re in good hands.

Please come visit our showroom! For the convenience of our dear clients our showroom is full of flooring that meet your lifestyle.

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile: 'Providing top-notch services at competitive prices for over 12 years across the GTA. Summit contractors have been awarded best of HomeStars contractors for three years in a row since 2018. We specialize in quality home improvement, renovation and remodeling including bathroom renovation, full basement renovation, kitchen renovation and heating and cooling. Our professional team consisting of operating and project management, in-house trades, licensed plumbers, electricians, HVAC technicians and renovation specialists enable us to fulfill our clients’ needs within the budget and timelines with precision, clarity, a unique understanding of the design-build process.'

profile:
Silver Lining Handywork was founded by Ricardo and Claudia Almeida in 2011. 

Ricardo has over a decade of experience in the construction industry. Claudia has extensive experience in customer service and working in office environments.

We are a family-owned, business located in Whitby, ON, Canada. We mainly provide services in our home community of Durham Region.

Our company is dedicated to serving all your handywork needs. We offer experienced, diligent, reliable, efficient, and professional help with your renovation, small project, or "to do" list.

Silver Lining Handywork is a verified company on the Homestars website. We are proud to boast that we won the Homestars "Best of Award" in 2013 and 2014. Feel free to visit our profile on Homestars to read our customer reviews. You can also like us on Facebook, and follow us on Twitter and Instagram .

Silver Lining Handywork is also an eco-friendly company. We strive to be paperless whenever possible. We provide our customers with written electronic estimates and invoices. 

Silver Lining Handywork is your handyman company. We look forward to working with you soon.

call 905-556-0533 or email us directly at silverlininghandywork@gmail.com to set up a free estimate
services:
Silver Lining Handywork provides the following services:
•	Backsplash, Tiling, Grouting
•	Replacing outlets/switches, lights
•	Toilet and Sink plumbing, Caulking
•	Hanging pictures, mirrors, fixtures, blinds
•	Building/Repairing decks, gates
•	Painting, Staining, Sanding
•	Drywall repair

Free Estimates:
call 905-556-0533 or email us directly at silverlininghandywork@gmail.com to set up a free estimate
specialities:
Kitchens: 
*Replace sinks, faucets, range hoods, dish washers, light fixtures
*Paint walls, doors, trimmings and baseboards
*Tile and grout floors and backsplashes
*Caulk around sinks

Bathrooms:
*Replace sinks, toilets, faucets, and shower heads
*Install shower curtain rods, towel rods, and toilet paper holders
*Paint walls, doors, trimmings and baseboards
*Change fans, and light fixtures
*Hang pictures, mirrors, and towel hooks
*Tile and grout floors and walls
*Caulk around sinks, tubs, and showers

Bedrooms:
*Paint trimmings, doors, walls and baseboards
*Remodel closet (put up rods and shelving)
*Change light fixtures
*Hang pictures and mirrors

Living Rooms/Family Rooms/Dining Rooms:
*Paint walls, doors, trimmings and baseboards
*Change light fixtures
*Hang pictures and mirrors

Basements/Laundry Rooms:
*Paint walls, doors, trimmings and baseboards
*Install cabinets and counter tops
*Replace laundry tubs

Outdoors
*Deck building and repair
*Gate building and repair

Free Estimates:
call 905-556-0533 or email us directly at silverlininghandywork@gmail.com to set up a free estimate

profile:
Precise Tile and Contracting Inc is a tile installation company located in Stouffville, Ontario, and has been servicing the Greater Toronto Area for over 25 years. We are committed to providing top quality tile installation services at competitive pricing.
 
Precise Tile and Contracting tile installation services include tile flooring, backsplashes, shower stalls, entryways, fireplaces, accent walls, and other custom tile design.  Majority of the areas we assist in include but are not limited to kitchens, bathroom and shower tiling, entryway, sunroom, and the basement of your residence. We also offer tile installation in the greater Toronto area for commercial and retail spaces such as restaurants, retail stores, commercial offices, and many other commercial and retail businesses.
 
Precise Tile offers professional tile installation services for ceramic, porcelain, slate, marble, granite, glass tile, stainless steel, bamboo, and many more.  Whether it’s mosaic tile, subway tile or you are looking for a pattern design within your tiles, Precise Tile is your best choice for tile installation.

Call us for a free quote today at 416-999-8453!

profile: Enlightened Tile is owned and operated by Andrew Prenter-Duff. Andrew has been tiling for over 6 years. He got his passion for tiling from the Get in Gear program. A fantastic government program that provides youth with a mentor ship program and skills in the trades. Following that he worked under a master tile setter from Russia, helping instilling in him the perfectionism of the trade. Since having started his business, all of his customers have seemed to want to extend their projects once he has started.
